Class BiclusVisPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  diagrams.Diagram
                      diagrams.BiclusVisPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class BiclusVisPanel
extends Diagram

BiclusVisPanel contains a BiclusVis representation and a tool bar with different options to apply to BiclusVis representation.

Author:
Rodrigo
See Also:
Serialized Form
